com.judoscript.util
Interface JavaClassCreator

public interface JavaClassCreator

A convenient interface for creating Java classes with byte codes. Refer to the Jamaica language as this closely models it.

All type names can be in either Java format or JVM format, * i.e., String or LString; and Java format is preferred. The accessFlags used in this API are the logical-OR of constants defined in reflect.Modifier.
